title: Paranormal World (The Semi-Physical World) - Novel Updates
tags: Ghosts   Male Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: 9Goblin 6Titan   妖九拐六
description: There are many things in this world that we have yet to discover. However, what we never encounter doesn’t mean it never existed. Most of the time, legends are not just mere legends, and traditions that lasted for generations has its untold cause.>
